import firebase from "firebase/app"
import "firebase/firestore"
import "firebase/auth"

const config = {
  apiKey: "AIzaSyBEOWAnYlarMVDtplmEhXMOHTnhlJ9fEKI",
  authDomain: "guitar-store-fd8f1.firebaseapp.com",
  databaseURL: "https://guitar-store-fd8f1.firebaseio.com",
  projectId: "guitar-store-fd8f1",
  storageBucket: "guitar-store-fd8f1.appspot.com",
  messagingSenderId: "101554253201",
  appId: "1:101554253201:web:ae33e473a31022668ffe30",
  measurementId: "G-2EPP5E1W66",
}

firebase.initializeApp(config)
firebase.analytics()

export const auth = firebase.auth()
export const firestore = firebase.firestore()

const provider = new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider()
provider.setCustomParameters({ prompt: "select_acount" })
export const signInWithGoogle = () => auth.signInWithPopup(provider)

export default firebase
